name: Glory of the Self-Styled Diehard girl
name_original: Glory of the Self-Styled Diehard girl
description:
*Not mechanical translation.
Story：
Kaoru was a stalwart young man dedicated to zest, justice, passion and awesomeness...
"I want to be a hardcore man!"
He defended the weak and challenged the strong and hated villains.
But one day while trying to save a child from the street, he was struck by a vehicle...
And woke up in a girl's body. "What the..."
Her massive breasts, perky cute ponytail made Kaoru a magnet.
All the man around her started to be attracted by her every action.
Now Kaoru is discovering his femininity side from the outside in...but In the Meantime,The bad guys who always failed when fighted with Kaoru while he was a man, plan to get revenge to her......How Kaoru Accept Herself After Became A Girl?and how to solve the predicament of bad guys revenge?
Kaoru's fate is on your hand......
Feature：
Initial experience of women’s body.(and this is YOUR body)
Thinking changed after be a women.
Different treatment of man and women while dating.
How to face change and accept your own destiny.
Content：
AVG game, easy operation
Beautiful picture and text, easy access to the story
Japanese dubbing, let you experience the story as real
different possibilities, you decide your own destiny
